meanings.sent2: I prefer sugarless tea for a healthier option.
meanings.sent3: She joked that his coffee was so sugarless, it was practically just hot water.
meanings.sent4: The sugarless dessert was a bitter reminder of healthier choices.
meanings.sent5: The sugarless diet made her appreciate the natural sweetness of fruits.

meanings.sent1: The sugarless cake was surprisingly delicious.
